resources.string-array:
Making Phone Calls Smarter
Set your current status and let the 
 people know if its the right time
 to call you//Manage your status and aware your well wishers about it
Check the current status of your saved 
 contacts and decide if its the right time
 to call them
Make your calls smart by adding a 
 tip before you call , so that the call 
 receiver knows the reason for your call.
